revised_title: Investigating the Ultra-Violet Absorption of Vitamin B\lt;sub\gt;1\lt;/sub\gt; Preparations
tldr: Researchers studied the ultra-violet absorption of crystalline vitamin B1 preparations and discovered that a substance in the preparation undergoes reversible changes in absorption when exposed to alkali. This substance is not responsible for the vitamin activity, and further investigation is needed to find a substance with similar behavior.
